```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Packages
library(scales)
library(here)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggdist)
library(bayesplot)
library(tidyverse)
# knitr chunk options
opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE, 
  cache = TRUE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  dev = "svg",
  fig.align = 'center'
  )
# Bayesplot color theme
color_scheme_set("darkgray")
```
